com.TeamJava.PaddleWars
Class intercept

java.lang.Object
  com.TeamJava.PaddleWars.intercept
public class intercept
extends java.lang.Object

This Class monitors one specific ball and paddle, and test to see if they intercept at any point in time. It accepts three different ball types, a game Ball (0), a bonus Ball (1) and a missile ball (2) It will react differently when an itersection occurs, depednding on the ball type.

Since:
26/8/03
See Also:
PaddleWars, ball, paddle, bonusManager

Delay

private int Delay

Method Detail

TestIntercept

public void TestIntercept(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double ptl,
                          java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double psize,
                          int psizeY,
                          int psizeX,
                          java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double ball,
                          int bR,
                          int ballSize,
                          int WhichPaddle,
                          java.applet.AudioClip paddleHit)
This method is used to determine if an intersection has taken place, and calls the appropriate response, depending on the ball type.

Parameters:
ptl - paddle Top Left.
psize - pSize.
psizeY - pSizeY.
psizeX - pSizeX.
ball - Ball.
bR - BallRadius.
ballSize - BallSize.
WhichPaddle - Holds which paddle is being tested to the Ball.
paddleHit - The audio clip to play when a ball hits the paddle.
See Also:
paddle, ball

TopRoundReflection

private void TopRoundReflection()
This method determines the x and y movement values that the ball should take after intersectiong the top round section of the monitored paddle. It does this by determinging firstly the x value for where the ball intersected the paddle, then finding the gradient of tangent to the semi-ccircle, which is the top of the paddle, at that point. It then finds the gradient of the line percendicular to the tangent, and reflects the ball along that path.

See Also:
getXIntercept, getTangent, getPerpendicular, ball

FlatReflection

private void FlatReflection()
This method determines the x and y movement values that the ball should take after intersectiong the flat section of the monitored paddle. It does this by reversing the x velocity of the ball, and leaving the y velocity the same.

See Also:
ball

BottomRoundReflection

private void BottomRoundReflection()
This method determines the x and y movement values that the ball should take after intersectiong the bottom round section of the monitored paddle. It does this by determinging firstly the x value for where the ball intersected the paddle, then finding the gradient of tangent to the semi-ccircle, which is the top of the paddle, at that point. It then finds the gradient of the line percendicular to the tangent, and reflects the ball along that path.

See Also:
getXIntercept, getTangent, getPerpendicular, ball

getXIntercept

private int getXIntercept(int Xa,
                          int K1,
                          int K2,
                          int Xb)
This method takes the given values and uses them to internally divide the line formed by the points given, in the ratio given. The y values are not important to this fourmula, as it only finds the x answer.

Parameters:
Xa - The x co-ordinate of the first point
K1 - The value of the ratio between the first point, and the point you wish to find
K2 - The value of the ratio between the second point, and the point you wish to find
Xb - The x co-ordinate of the second point
Returns:
Returns the x value that divides the line formed by the given points, in the given ratio.

getTanget

private double getTanget(int x,
                         int r)
Finds the gradient of the tangent to the top half of a circle, at a x value given, taking the circle's center to be at (0,0).

Parameters:
x - The x co-ordinate at which you wish to find the gradient
r - The radius of the circle
Returns:
The gradient of the tangent.

getPerpendicular

private double getPerpendicular(double M1)
Finds the gradient which represents a line perpendicular to the line formed by the gradient given.

Parameters:
M1 - The gradient of the line for which to find the perpendicualr gradient.
Returns:
The gradient fo the perpendicular line

missileHit

private void missileHit(int paddle)
This method controls what happens when a missile hits the paddle.

Parameters:
paddle - The array value of the Paddle hit.

PaddleWars
